issue.title: [Archery] should not return non-zero in `benchmark diff` sub command on regression
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5544](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5544). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When a regression is detected, but the command ran successfully, it should return zero. Currently it returns the number of regression. This is to play better with ursabot. It should be left to the user to decide what to do with the json data.
